DOC.detailed_description: This open-label extension study evaluate long-term safety tolerability intravenous ( IV ) MEDI-546 adult subject moderately-to-severely active systemic lupus erythematosus ( SLE ) . Subjects must complete qualify Phase 2 study meet study criterion order eligible .
DOC.criteria: Must willing use 2 method effective contraception Must venous access Must willing forego participation clinical trial SLE .
